title: Makutsu No Ou ~Yomei Ikkagetsu No Doutei, Mahou Shoujo Harem O Kizuite Ou E Kunrinsu~
alternative_title: 魔窟の王～余命一か月の童貞、魔法少女ハーレムを築いて王へ君臨す～ ; Makutsu no Ou ~Yomei Ikkagetsu no Doutei, Mahou Shoujo Harem wo Kizuite Ou he Kunrinsu~ ; The King of the Demon Cave: A Male Virgin with One Month Left to Live, Builds a Magical Girl Harem and Reigns as King
status: 魔窟の王～余命一か月の童貞、魔法少女ハーレムを築いて王へ君臨す～ ; Makutsu no Ou ~Yomei Ikkagetsu no Doutei, Mahou Shoujo Harem wo Kizuite Ou he Kunrinsu~ ; The King of the Demon Cave: A Male Virgin with One Month Left to Live, Builds a Magical Girl Harem and Reigns as King
description:
Description :
        After being transported to another world and wandering a forest inhabited by monsters, Shimizu Shouichi's life is saved by a cute fairy called Ami. He is given the skills to survive in the other world, but in exchange, he has to make a girl climax once a month or he will die! Shouichi, who has no experience with women, is hesitant at first, but Ami's skillful conversation skills lead him to become honest about the desires hidden deep within his heart... If he doesn't have sex with a magical girl, he will die!?  A tale of the rise of an introverted, unpopular virgin and a doggy-style-obsessed fairy!

chapters.chapter_name: Chapter 1: The Man Who Went To Another World
